entry.title: Ice • 氷
entry.content: The banner says “Ice”, signifying that this Gion shop sells Shaved Ice (かき氷); the fluffy, flavored ice dessert popular in summertime.

entry.title: Osaka Castle • 大阪城
entry.content: Looking at Osaka Castle accoss the inner moat and stone rampart. Originally built in 1583, it has been rebuilt several times, most recently in 1997.

entry.title: Morning Green • 朝の緑
entry.content: Looking northeast up the Hozugawa River in Arashiyama this morning, the water is glassy and the hills are really green now.

entry.title: Kyoto Today • 今日の京都
entry.content: Two sides of Kyoto today: above, the serenity of an inner garden at Kennin-ji Temple; below people celebrating a warm spring day outside on the Kamogawa River.
